name: Pong (itch) (Leifer)
description:
Simple pong game prototype, mainly to allow me to learn Godot.

Playable in pairs, offline.

Player 1 (left side)

Throw the ball :

  • Spacebar + D (throw to the right)
  • Spacebar + Q (throw to the left)

Move the bar :

  • Z (Move to the top)
  • S (Move to the bottom)

Player 2 (right side)

Throw the ball :

  • Spacebar + Right Arrow (throw to the right)
  • Spacebar + Left Arrow (throw to the left)

Move the bar :

  • Up Arrow (Move to the top)
  • Down Arrow (Move to the bottom)
